name: Scorpion
title: The Hell's Champion
subtitle: A vengeful spectre who commands hellfire and chains
lore: Once a member of the Shirai Ryu clan, Scorpion was reborn as a vengeful spectre after his clan's destruction. Now wielding the powers of hellfire and equipped with his signature chain spear, he stalks the battlefield seeking retribution. His mastery over portals and burning rage make him a terrifying opponent to face.

passive.name: Harrowing Blaze
passive.description: Scorpion's first damage inflicts burning on the target, dealing [3%] of their maximum HP as damage over 10 seconds. (20s cd/enemy)

Q.name: GET OVER HERE
Q.description: Scorpion throws his chain in the targeted direction, pulling the hit enemy towards him and dealing [70/95/135/200/375/420] damage. The hit enemy is slowed by [35%] for [1.5s].

W.name: Hellfire Blades
W.description: Scorpion's next basic attack uses his dual blades, dealing [210% AD] damage and an additional [50] bonus damage to all targets.

E.name: Open Portal
E.description: Scorpion opens a portal on a designated wall, allowing only himself to pass through. The portal remains active for [25s].

R.name: Hellgate
R.description: Scorpion opens a portal beneath him after selecting an area. He teleports to the edge of the selected area after a [1s] delay (he decides the edge). The portal can be used to teleport back and forth while it's active. The portal lasts for [8s].

1.name: Swift Blades
1.description: The Hellfire Blades (W) cooldown is reduced by 2s.

1.name: Burning Vengeance
1.description: Burned characters take [12%] more damage if Scorpion hits them again.

1.name: Mortal Strike
1.description: Successful hits with GET OVER HERE (Q) reduce the healing of the hit enemy by [35%] for [3s].

5.name: Spreading Flames
5.description: Harrowing Blaze explodes upon expiration and can spread to nearby enemies.

5.name: Blood Thirst
5.description: Scorpion gains [8%] Lifesteal. Gain additional [4%] lifesteal against monsters.

5.name: Deadly Strike
5.description: Hellfire Blades (W) deals [325%] AD damage but no longer reduces the enemy's armor.

10.name: Hell's Embrace
10.description: Enemies entering Hellgate take [5%] more damage from Scorpion.

10.name: Portal Master
10.description: Using Hellgate reduces the cooldown of Open Portal (E) by [15s].

15.name: Quick Strike
15.description: All Scorpion abilities cooldowns are reduced by 1s.

15.name: Double Portal
15.description: Open Portal (E) gains a second charge with a cooldown of 45s.

15.name: Glass Cannon
15.description: Scorpion's maximum HP is reduced by [9%], but his damage is increased by [16%].

20.name: Crippling Flames
20.description: Harrowing Blaze slows the enemy's movement by [50%].

20.name: Combat Mastery
20.description: Scorpion's basic attacks reduce his ability cooldowns by 1s.

20.name: Endless Burn
20.description: Each autoattack against the same target reduces the cooldown of Harrowing Blaze on that target by 1s.

20.name: First Blood
20.description: Grants Scorpion [4%MAXHP] damage for his first spell on he hits on each target [35s cd/target]
